item.description: I plan on attending this open town hall style meeting regarding the states transportation system and upgrades. DOT Aviation Chair Chris Willenborg will be attending. Not sure where we fit in, but worth going to in order to find out our future. Own a T Hangar? All the more reason to attend. http://www.massdot.st... October 16, 2012 5:30 - 7:30 PM Fitchburg Public Library Auditorium 610 Main Street Fitchburg, MA 01420 Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Mass DOT w Aviation Chair, meeting at Fitchburg Library.
